JOHN HARSH III

jharsh@austin.rr.com • (512) 312-1995 • johnharsh.com • Austin, TX

EXPERIENCED AREA MANAGER

Dynamic and self-directed telecommunications professional with progressive expertise in leadership, team building, analytical problem solving, technical writing, and project management. Skilled in collaborating with multiple departments with diverse needs to achieve corporate objectives. Proven performance in linking corporate vision with the delivery of desired results through empowerment, development and utilization of people, process and technology.

  • 14 years of supervisory experience
  • 18+ years’ experience installation and maintenance of telecommunications
